ippoz.reload.manager

Class EvaluatorManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • ippoz.reload.commons.support.ThreadScheduler
        • ippoz.reload.manager.DataManager
          • ippoz.reload.manager.EvaluatorManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class EvaluatorManager
extends DataManager
    The Class EvaluatorManager. The manager of the evaluation-scoring phase. Called after the training or when train scores are already available.
    Author:
    Tommy
